name: Pharm Pharaoh
description:
Are you tut enough to know how to navigate your pharmaceutical molecules?

Move your red staff from one red target to the other by clicking on unvisited neighboring atoms. 

Atoms with colorful halos are linked gateways that you can traverse through to jump around the molecule.

However, red X's are always there to block your path to pharmaceutical victory.

In addition, all beakers must be collected before reaching the destination target.

If you reach the other red target and none of the aforementioned criteria are met, you will have to start again.

If you ever get stuck or want to restart your path, you may also click on the red target you initially started on.

Once you have found all the unique paths possible in the current molecule, you will progress to another autogenerated map.

Good luck, future ruler!

-------------------------

This is a work in progress. Please donate if you like the game! More molecule maps coming soon!
